title: CVE-2024-4367 PDF.js vulnerability | No advisory from Mozilla?
content:
CVE-2024-4367 has been announced several days now with MITRE and CIS. There is also an issue/advisory on the github repo for PDF.js which appears that the fix has been merged into the master commit of PDF.js (https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wgrm-67xf-hhpq).

The vulnerability is pretty serious and yet there is no Security Advisory from Mozilla on affected versions, etc. (https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/security/advisories/)

Is this normal and I am just being impatient?
creator: calvin.tate

title: Subfolders not opening
content: using Win 11, Firefox browser, Google search. subfolders are listed but will not open. Using Bing they do open but I prefer Google. If this is a Google problem or a Win 11 can you steer me in the right direction. Thanks My email is artsiii@aol.com
creator: artsiii

title: Login broken across multiple sites
content:
I haven't been able to login with MFA on my uni website and also make purchases using credit cards on commercial sites.

I have tried Troubleshooting mode and the problem persists. Switching to Opera browser showed normal functionality.

Firefox 125.0.3 (64-bit) on macOS 14.4
creator: dm4n

title: Bookmarks etc not Syncing w/ FF Sync to Mac OS
content: I have Mac, Windows, and Linux boxes. All show connected to Firefox Sync, however, bookmarks etc are only actually in sync between Windows and Linux. I've tried logging out on all devices, resetting passwords, reinstalling FF on the Mac. Can't seem to get it to work.
creator: darintenb

title: Meu computador antigo crashou. Consegui fazer um backup das minhas pastas pessoais mas nao estou conseguindo achar uma forma de importar os meus favoritos. Como eu importo os favoritos a partir de arquivos de backup?
content: Meu computador antigo crashou, mas felizmente consegui fazer um backup das minhas pastas pessoais. Como eu consigo importar os favoritos a partir de copias de arquivos de backup?
creator: mauricio15
